choose.when: select p.payment_code, p.payment_date, pd.payment_des_name from payment p, payment_des pd where p.payment_des_code = pd.payment_des_code

select p.payment_code, p.payment_date, pd.payment_des_name from payment p, payment_des pd where p.payment_des_code = pd.payment_des_code and SUBSTR(TO_DATE(SUBSTR(p.payment_date,1,6), 'YYYY-MM'),1,5) = #{date,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by p.payment_date

mapper.select: select sp.selection_of_payment_code, s.site_name, j.job_class_name from selection_of_payment sp, site s, job_class j where sp.site_code = s.site_code and sp.job_class_code = j.job_class_code and sp.payment_code =#{x} order by sp.selection_of_payment_code
select site_code, site_name from site order by site_code
select job_class_code, job_class_name from job_class order by job_class_code
mapper.insert: insert into payment(payment_code, payment_date, payment_des_code, int_user_id, int_date) values(payment_code_seq.nextval, #{payment_date}, #{payment_des_name}, #{user}, sysdate)

insert into selection_of_payment(selection_of_payment_code, payment_code, site_code, job_class_code, int_user_id, int_date) values(selection_of_payment_code_seq.nextval, #{x}, #{site_code}, #{job_class_code}, #{user}, sysdate)
